guideline: Dispose of plastic bottles and containers in a designated recycling bin.
Compost food scraps and yard waste to create natural fertilizer.
Take old electronics to an e-waste recycling center.
Separate glass bottles by color before recycling.
Rinse and clean metal cans before placing them in a recycling bin.
Flatten cardboard boxes before disposal to save space.
Dispose of batteries and paint at authorized hazardous waste facilities.
Place sharps (like needles) in puncture-resistant containers before disposal.
Sort concrete, wood, and drywall for proper recycling or disposal.
Donate gently used clothing or repurpose fabric scraps.
